item.title: About
item.description:
Greetings!

This website is on R and Python for Data Analysis. The posts are mostly translated from Sumeun Data Science. Here is some info about the maintainer of the site. Check out the links.

Education

  • Seoul National University. B.S. in Physics.

  • Seoul National University. Ph.D. in Cognitive Science.

Books

  • Kim, K. H. (2022). R로 하는 빅데이터 분석: 데이터 전처리와 시각화. Big Data Analysis with R: Data preprocessing and visualization, 3rd. Sumeun. Seoul.

  • Kim, K. H. (2019). 고등학교 인수분해 완전 정복. Conquering high school factoring. Sumeun. Seoul.

  • Kim, K. H., Kwak. M. Y., Lee, C. S. (2017). 수학의 숨은 원리. Hidden priciples of Mathematics. Sumeun. Seoul.

  • Kim, K. H. (2013). 기초 통계학의 숨은 원리 이해하기. Understanding the hidden principles of basic statistics. Kyungmoon. Seoul.

Papers

  • Hyosoo Moon, Kwonhyun Kim, Hyun-Soo Lee, Moonseo Park, Trefor P. Williams, Bosik Son, and Jae-Youl Chun(2020). Cost Performance Comparison of Design-Build and Design-Bid-Build for Building and Civil Projects Using Mediation Analysis. Journal of Construction Engineering and Management.

  • Kim, Y. H., Jeon, J. H., Choe, E. K., Lee, B., Kim, K., Seo, J. (2016). TimeAware: Leveraging framing effects to enhance personal productivity. In Proceedings of the SIGCHI conference on human factors in computing systems.

Awards

  • ASCE(American Society of Civil Engineers) Thomas Fitch Rowland Prize. (2022).

Links

  • R-bloggers
